text: Ane allaha ta'alani bandagi karo ane teni sathe ko'ine bhagidara na theravo ane mata-pita sathe sarum vartana karo ane sagansambandhi'o, anatho, lacaro, najikana padosi, ajana padosi, sahavasi'o, potani sathe saphara karanara, ane te'o sathe, je'ona tame malika cho, ni:Sanka allaha ta'ala ghamanda karanara, itaravanara'one pasanda nathi karato
